name: YOU-REALM
description:
Welcome to YOU-REALM!

Spencer is just a regular college student.

He knows his past, he knows what he wants for his future...  Could that all crumble before him when a sinister abandoned MMO resurfaces?

YOU-REALM is a month long project I worked on for Dream Diary Jam 3.
I took a lot of time focusing on variety in this entry in between my work and other times where I have to be away from the computer. 

With what is here, I hope you enjoy the things I put in the game for now. I may continue work on this in the future as I still have assets left over with no place to put them at the moment, so if you enjoy what is here please let me know! With this being a project that had a month deadline  I hope you can excuse errors if you find any in this version!

There is a total of 5 Forms to find in this version of the game. Not including the Guide.
